author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Yemen 'faces nightmare' as first coronavirus case confirmed
description: Aid agencies warn a coronavirus outbreak will cause havoc in a country already devastated by years of civil war.
content:
Image copyrightEPAImage caption
 Yemen was the last Arab country to confirm the presence of coronavirus
Aid agencies have expressed alarm after the first virus case was confirmed in Yemen, where years of civil war have devastated health systems.
